choices.text:
Below is an instruction that describes a task. Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

### Instruction:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews

### Response:

Sure! Here is a sample meal plan that meets your dietary restrictions and provides balanced nutrition for today. 

Breakfast:
- Overnight oats with almond milk (use coconut or soy milk instead of almond milk if needed)
- Fresh berries
- Chia seeds

Lunch:
- Quinoa salad with mixed vegetables, avocado and lemon dressing 
- Grilled chicken breast on the side (use tofu or tempeh as a vegan option)

Snack:
- Apple slices with peanut butter (use sunflower seed butter if allergic to nuts)

Dinner:
- Baked salmon with lemon and dill 
- Steamed broccoli or spinach on the side
- Brown rice or quinoa as a side option

Remember to drink plenty of water throughout the day, and adjust portion sizes according to your individual needs. Enjoy your healthy meal plan!
